constraints.name: adjacency_relation
constraints.description: 相邻元素满足特定关系（对于所有 1 ≤ i ≤ n-1，有 a_i + k_i ≤ a_{i+1}）

constraints.name: range_bound
constraints.description: 数组 a 的元素在更新后仍需满足相邻元素的关系约束
constraints.formal: After each update, ∀ 1 ≤ i ≤ n-1, a_i + k_i ≤ a_{i+1}

constraints.name: subsequence_constraint
constraints.description: 查询区间 [l, r] 内的子数组和
constraints.formal: For each query (l, r), compute sum(a[l:r])
